summary: National Security Advisor, Secretary of State - architect of Cold War realpolitik and covert operations
key_facts: National Security Advisor (1969-1975), Secretary of State (1973-1977)
Operation Condor - South American regime support and coordination
Chile coup (1973) - 'I don't see why we need to stand by and watch a country go communist'
Opening to China (1971), détente with USSR
Nobel Peace Prize (1973) while Cambodia bombing continued
War crimes allegations - arrested if visiting certain countries
concealment: Classified Chile coup planning, Cambodia bombing authorization, Operation Condor coordination
